title: Onto Innovation Appoints Boston Scientific Senior Financial Executive as Chief Financial Officer - Yahoo Finance
content: Onto Innovation Appoints Boston Scientific Senior Financial Executive as Chief Financial Officer  Yahoo Finance
description: WILMINGTON, Mass., May 17, 2022--Onto Innovation Inc. (NYSE: ONTO) ("Onto Innovation," "Onto," or the "Company") today announced the appointment of Mark Slicer to succeed Steve Roth as Onto Innovationâ€™s chief financial officer.
